title: Recent Advances on Uniqueness of Competitive Equilibrium
abstract: This article reviews the recent advances in the uniqueness and multiplicity of competitive equilibria in models arising in mathematical economics, finance, macroeconomics, and trade.
context:
Title: Recent Advances on Uniqueness of Competitive Equilibrium
Abstract: This article reviews the recent advances in the uniqueness and multiplicity of competitive equilibria in models arising in mathematical economics, finance, macroeconomics, and trade.
translated_title: 竞争均衡唯一性的最新进展
translated_abstract: 本文综述了数学经济学、金融学、宏观经济学和贸易中涉及的模型中竞争均衡的唯一性和多样性的最新进展。
tldr: 本文回顾了竞争均衡的唯一性和多样性在数学经济学、金融学、宏观经济学和贸易中的最新进展。
